review_data.title: Il miglior Hamburger in città, senza dubbio
review_data.content: Sono stato con un gruppo di amici in questo ristorante. Qualità degli hamburger ottima, porzioni abbondanti e gusti super! Inoltre,...More

review_data.title: Leckeres Essen, gemütlich, tolle Bedienung
review_data.content: Die Burger (Fleisch und Veggie) waren ausgezeichnet, die Atmosphäre und das Lokal sind sehr authentisch und gemütlich, die Bedienung war...More

review_data.title: near miss
review_data.content: First of all - the Union Diner has taken over the location of the Helvti Diner. The interior changes are minimal, nostalgia kicked in as I was a regular for years at the Helvti Diner. So, let's give it a go - my first Union...More

review_data.title: Best Burger in Switzerland
review_data.content: I have tried many burgers in my time but haven’t come across such a quality product in a long while. The patty was juicy, the bread freshly baked and the homemade sauces top end. This is definitely the best quality burger I have had in...More
